fragment:
<set-variable name="requestOutcome" value="@{
        try {
            JObject requestBody = (JObject) context.Request.Body.As(preserveContent: true);
            return ((string) requestBody["outcome"]).ToUpper();
        } catch (Exception e) {
            return "NONE";
        }
    }" />
  <set-variable name="responseOutcome" value="@{
        try {
            JObject responseBody = (JObject) context.Response.Body.As(preserveContent: true);
            return ((string) responseBody["outcome"]).ToUpper();
        } catch (Exception e) {
            return "NONE";
        }
    }" />
